title: Student Grades Dictionary
description: Create a program that stores student grades in a dictionary. The dictionary keys should be the student names and the values should be another dictionary with the subject names as keys and the grades as values. The program should allow the user to add a student, add a subject grade for a student, and print all the grades for a student.
sample_input: Add student John, Add subject Math for John with grade 90, Add subject Science for John with grade 85, Print grades for John
